summary: Windsor Castle, in England, is a famous home for the royal family. It's about 25 miles west of London. The castle was built by William the Conqueror after invading England in the 11th century. Over time, it became a grand palace with beautiful rooms and gardens. Many kings and queens have lived and made changes here. It has survived wars and is the longest-occupied palace in Europe. Today, it's a popular place for tourists to visit and learn about royal history.
title: Windsor Castle
